seo.description: More than a simple portfolio: a complete tuor through Bocchio's mind and interests. Articles, portals and WebApps that goes from coding to engineering.

wraps.title: Who am I?
paragraph: Hi! My name is Tommaso and I am a mechanical engineering student at Politecnico di Milano.
While studying, in my free time I develop a huge passion for computer science and coding.
I always want to create new things, try my hand at new challenges, and many times I get carried away until I succeed or am fully satisfied.
Finally, I strongly believe in contact with nature as a source of inspiration, and this is probably why I practice Orienteering...

wraps.title: Site's contents
paragraph: The site is structured over three main sections:

• Articles: all the projects realized described accurately
  • Portals: WebApps builts to support particular features of some project
  • Forum: designed to encourage discussion and exchange of ideas. You can visit it at the bottom of each article.
Generally speaking, all articles, portals and site itself are to be considered free to use.
The distribution of the contents, ideas or concepts that can be found on these pages is absolutely a positive act and to be promoted.

wraps.title: What's the aim?
paragraph: This site was born out of the desire to have my own space where I could share my ideas and projects with others.
I'm convinced that social media are for some aspect restrictive and impose you too many limitations.

So, main aim has always been to create a web space that was totally personal and to be organized in completely autonomy. While developing it, I realized his enormous potential, that was very far from a simple board of articles and posts...
